query:
MATCH p = (a:Group)-[:CoerceAndRelayToAdminService|:CoerceAndRelayToSMB|:MSSQL_HostFor|:MSSQL_Contains|:CoerceAndRelayToMSSQL|:MSSQL_IsMappedTo|:MSSQL_MemberOf|:MSSQL_ControlDB|:MSSQL_ControlServer|:MSSQL_LinkedAsAdmin|:SCCM_AssignAllPermissions|:SCCM_AdminsReplicatedTo*..4]->(b:SCCM_Site)
WHERE a.name CONTAINS 'AUTHENTICATED USERS'
RETURN p
name: SCCM Hierarchy TAKEOVERs
